name: Prasad Anumula

bio: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years in full-stack development, system architecture, and cloud solutions. Passionate about building scalable applications and mentoring developers. Currently leading development of microservices architecture and cloud-based solutions.

bio: Business strategist with 6+ years of experience in operations, business development, and strategic planning. Specializes in helping startups optimize processes and scale efficiently. Currently helping startups and SMEs optimize operations and develop growth strategies.

bio: Product innovation expert with 7+ years in product management, user experience design, and market-driven product development. Passionate about creating products that users love. Currently leading product innovation initiatives and user experience improvements.

bio: Business development professional with 5+ years of experience in strategic planning, growth initiatives, and partnership development. Specializes in helping startups scale their business operations. Currently developing strategic partnerships and growth initiatives for startups.
